companions.content: data class Customer(val name: String, val phone: String)
data class Menu(val name: String, val price: Double, val description: String, val image: String)
data class Comment(val content: String, val likes: Int)

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/menu_recycler"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"/>
    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/comment_recycler"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"/>
</LinearLayout>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content">
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/menu_image"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_name"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_price"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
</LinearLayout>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content">
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/comment_content"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/comment_like"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
</LinearLayout>

<resources>
    <string name="app_name">牛太郎餐厅</string>
    <string name="menu_name">牛太郎餐厅</string>
    <string name="menu_price">20.0</string>
    <string name="comment_content">很好吃</string>
    <string name="comment_like">点赞</string>
</resources>
